item.title: 'Ph.D. Grind' Reflection
item.description: Note: This article is automatically translated, please turn to the Chinese version for more accurate expression if possible. There is still no clear plan for my future. There are many ways to go in the future. Beiyou Zhibo, foreign school insurance research, overseas study and study/reading blogs must be slowly understood. At the same time, you need to figure out what you want, but these also require more experience to
